Two rookies reused primes for their RSA keys. Intercept the ciphertext: ciphertext1: 677648576728039697495250507238132437312302218901739575135081053211097836090648657893111162293501690285828022261466488673886468028775580229427028402140093, ciphertext2: 782036401269213828707968329822192333058363443867080778750738041713051994687882752362873648858367697039198999923225809309600013591587315432344573926896005 and recover the secret exploited by their common factor mistake.

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=4182101237830407292764965409087042632768052699562403423311520050488731247234969541372413144977916127079620765532972324380973927446383154817854012597246889, n2=5871038823884435223979370244140840049470050183415306536109165442158755590692382790579265592991646279091312680698614906577758040669682166193320441438728387, e=676143760718345264712932917471009639244782108845533637120634114313409270600438202784445658941730565522564122668092726928508103636088592037076022387584439

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{35no9e9e}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 677648576728039697495250507238132437312302218901739575135081053211097836090648657893111162293501690285828022261466488673886468028775580229427028402140093, ciphertext2: 782036401269213828707968329822192333058363443867080778750738041713051994687882752362873648858367697039198999923225809309600013591587315432344573926896005
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=4182101237830407292764965409087042632768052699562403423311520050488731247234969541372413144977916127079620765532972324380973927446383154817854012597246889, n2=5871038823884435223979370244140840049470050183415306536109165442158755590692382790579265592991646279091312680698614906577758040669682166193320441438728387, e=676143760718345264712932917471009639244782108845533637120634114313409270600438202784445658941730565522564122668092726928508103636088592037076022387584439
extra_info: p=72005467507818302767789902878915082286349499720838145299330162986903810353821, q=58080328933026060782311284644559191238127241665793280507572505018979035312509, r=101084806710624571779690722502688875370164987009598457375432294809645446004543, φ(n1)=4182101237830407292764965409087042632768052699562403423311520050488731247234839455575972300614366025892097291259447847639587296020576252149848129751580560, φ(n2)=5871038823884435223979370244140840049470050183415306536109165442158755590692223625443621942359084277084165432632006614349082648931799161393491816957411336
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
